description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. "Taking a Coffee Break" has a whole new meaning! Battle with your AVATAR to the top of EvilTech in Story Mode. Fight against your friends ONLINE.  Endure waves of enemies in Survival Mode.  This game is every office drone's dream!
